HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we enhance the usability of the phone app for newcomers?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Users struggle with the phone app's functionality, leading to confusion.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: I had more problems with the phone app than I did with the computer based web application.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we improve the onboarding process for new committee members?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: New members find it challenging to understand the event organization process.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: The training process that is undertaken in good faith is really not adequate to allow a committee co-chair to be facile.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we create a centralized knowledge repository for event management best practices?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Lack of institutional memory leads to repeated mistakes in event organization.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: There’s not a facile way to have some kind of archival process or some way to, you know, to put in a note to the file for the information.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we streamline the event registration process to reduce confusion?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Users are confused about their registration status due to conflicting information.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: I'm looking at the actual log here. And your registration expired because you didn't pay within the first 15 minutes.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we ensure clear communication about event details to users?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Users find event descriptions and schedules unclear.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: Event descriptions and especially save the date kinds of things or conflicting scheduling things were not as transparent or not as clear.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we leverage technology to automate event management tasks?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Manual processes bog down event organization.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: The mechanics of what I'm going to refer to as the back office work.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we provide better training resources for event coordinators?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Current training resources are inadequate for new event coordinators.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: The training process really needs to have some hard, hard look at two issues.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we integrate alumni into the newcomers community effectively?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Alumni are not currently engaged in a meaningful way.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: How we can fold alumni into that in a comfortable kind of way.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we develop a more user-friendly interface for the newcomers website?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: The website's current interface may not be inviting for new users.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: Cleaner, simpler, better is my approach.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we implement a system for printed name tags that serves both aesthetic and functional purposes?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Handwritten name tags can create confusion about registration status.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: If I saw anyone walking around with a name tag that was a pencil, sharpie, handwritten name tag... that was a clue that that person may not have been registered.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we create a more reliable way to track event registrations?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Inaccurate registration tracking leads to participant confusion.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: My phone app says I'm registered. I'm sorry. So anyway, the point is a major area of improvement would be to improve the interface.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we foster a culture of knowledge sharing within the newcomers organization?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: There is a lack of shared knowledge among committee members.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: The only behind the scenes person that really has any long term history is Charlie.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we improve the clarity of event scheduling information on the website?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Users struggle to find clear and concise scheduling information.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: Conflicting scheduling things were not as transparent or not as clear.

HMW_Questions.HMW_question: How might we create a feedback mechanism for users to report issues with the website/app?
HMW_Questions.problem/need: Users have trouble communicating their issues with the platform.
HMW_Questions.supporting_evidence: The biggest problem I had with the whole process, frankly, was dealing with people who were not savvy users.
